about_us.title: About us?
about_us.beginParagraph: It all started 20 years ago with a father's need to provide for his family; With limited resources he began painting apartments to rent to a company called Westdale Properties, who gave him the opportunity to paint units in a building in Toronto.
about_us.beginParagraph_2: 3 months later the father of the family was unemployed and to his surprise 2 days later they called to make some repairs on their properties, once they realized the contractor's capabilities; They offered the father a job, where to this day they have 19 years of experience in construction.
about_us.presentParagraph: We have been Westdale Properties' #1 contractor for many years. On the other hand, starting with the St Catharines properties we expanded to Windsor Kingston Brockville and part of Toronto to this day.
about_us.misionParagraph: Offer the client quality in the renovation of all branches required within the construction, with their appropriate permits in order to have the units renovated in a minimum but effective delivery time. Linking our employees to belonging to the great Glasgow family, considering them an integral part of our projects and objectives to be met
about_us.visionParagraph: In the next 4 years we seek to be recognized for the best quality, professionalism and punctuality in construction service; Likewise, continue to meet the objective of customer satisfaction in the areas of accessible value and minimum delivery time.
